Snorql: A SPARQL Explorer

Available extended features:

  • DESCRIBE DATASET describes the dataset behind the SPARQL service endpoint (voiD + RDFStats - see SPARQL New Features WD
  • DESCRIBE SERVICE describes the service endpoint including a link to the dataset - see SPARQL New Features WD
  • EXPLAIN SELECT... explains a query (query engine specific details)
  • BINDINGS for query federation - see SPARQL New Features WD

Please send comments to AndyL
